pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw:
Confirmed on this branch:
~~~
$ gazebo/gui/UNIT_TimePanel_TEST 
********* Start testing of TimePanel_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : TimePanel_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : TimePanel_TEST::ValidTimes() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
SharePercentChange[0.751559] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
ResPercentChange[1.84815]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
QWARN  : TimePanel_TEST::ValidTimes() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
SharePercentChange[-0.000405643] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
ResPercentChange[0.187694]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
RESULT : TimePanel_TEST::ValidTimes():
     7,881 msecs per iteration (total: 7,881, iterations: 1)
PASS   : TimePanel_TEST::ValidTimes()
QFATAL : TimePanel_TEST::Visibility() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : TimePanel_TEST::Visibility() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 2 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of TimePanel_TEST *********
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~
backtrace:
